attributes.action: Curb trade with Russia and close London's financial centre to Russians until they withdraw fron Ukrainian teritory
attributes.additional_details:
Curb trade with Russia and close London's financial centre to Russians until Russia withdraws from Ukrainian Territory.
A government of conscience cannot put economics ahead of the lives of 46 million Ukrainians which the UK government has done by removing the possibility of trade and financial sanctions..
The Ukrainian people should be given the chance to internally resolve their domestic issues without the intervention of Russia.
